item.description:
At a recent Meet Up, it was suggested that we
Try a Bowling Meet Up in a Central Location like
Wallingford.

So, let us see if anyone comes to a Meet Up at

Brunswick Colony Lanes
600 South Colony Road
Wallingford, Conn.
06492

http://www.merchantci...

www.merchantcircle.com/business/Brunswick.Colony.Lanes.203-269-1415

We will go there for bowling, conversation,
Coffee, other beverages and good times.

This is another place that those who cannot
Be around alcohol should probably keep away from.

Instead of complaining about it, why don?t you actually
Come to one of our Coffee Only Meet Ups for a change.
There will be another Wallingford Meet Up at a Coffee Location
The day after Bowling.

If anyone comes to this Bowling Meet Up will decide
If we will try to have any more like it in the future.

This is not an all of the time Bowling Meet Up group.
If you want to Go Bowling more often, then I would suggest that you
Join either a local Bowling League or a Bowling
Meet Up group.

Remember that you will have to rent special shoes to
Go Bowling. Unless you have your own bowling shoes.
Unless you have your own bowling ball, you will have to
Look around the Bowling Alley for one that fits your
Hand and how you Bowl.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Most member should know us, but I might have Meet Up sign on the Table.
item.why: You want to join a group that is trying different things.
item.name: Who wants to Go Bowling on a Saturday night
